attributes.action: Allow home quarantine for vaxxed UK citizens returning from red list countries
attributes.additional_details: Many UK citizens have families in red list territories and haven’t been able to reunite with family for months as a result of the pandemic. The cost of £1,750 for hotel quarantine upon arrival makes it nearly impossible for us to visit our families. I am from South Africa (there are almost 250,000 South Africans in England) and even though we have a varient of concern in SA, home quarantine and test to release should offer enough protection especially if we are double jabbed.
attributes.background: We want the government to allow home quarantine and test to release schemes for double jabbed UK citizens (as opposed to £1,750 hotel quarantine) in order to make it possible for us to reunite with our families in our home countries.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
